page.title: 13STALHAM MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content:
Vicky Woods used to go to Catfield School but now she has to go out of the block to Stalham Middle.
"I walk down to catch Neave's coach at 7.50. The bus arrives at Stalham Middle at 8.15. School starts at 8.30 with assembly. There are about 470 children at the school. There are 17 classes with about 28 children in each. The first and second year make up lower school, and the third and fourth year are upper school. We stay with one teacher for two years.Our uniform is red, white and grey. We do English, maths, science, history, geography, French, music, P.E. and games. We have a nice field to play on and a new sports hall being built. It should be ready by September. It is a very nice school."
